message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider that the value decreases for me over time.
Alice, your split seems unfair considering the inflation working against you. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Let's close this deal and both benefit.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the inflation significantly impacts me. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to counterbalance the loss in value I'm facing.
